name: Obsolete Things
description:
Title: Obsolete Things

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview: The duck, Eddie, has to take massive leaps to reach the doorway at the top of the map. However, Eddie gets hungry and he needs to eat all ten pancakes to make it through the doorway. Help feed Eddie and get him to safety.

Instructions: The left arrow moves Eddie to the left and the right arrow moves Eddie to the right. Space is jump.

Game Design Team: Isabella Martin – Game Designer
